trivia_items.text: His name is likely derived from the Old Nordic word heilagr, meaning "holy" or "sacred."
Hellagur has the highest amount of fighting experience of all the Operators, at 44 years.
Some of Hellagur's physical features are inspired by the hippogriff, with one depicted in his Elite 2 artwork.
sub_items: This makes Hellagur, along with Archetto, the only Liberi who has the traits of a legendary creature with avian features instead of an actual avian.

trivia_items.text: Hellagur's voice actor, Show Hayami, is also known for voicing Sousuke Aizen in Bleach. Indeed, both characters shares a similar baritone.
At 193 cm, Hellagur is tied with Lee for the second tallest Operator --Mountain being tallest-- currently in the game.
